title: How to play Tryndamere!

embed.description: Tryndamere Jungle is probably the easiest / funnest to play in season 6 for new starters, Give him a shot and see how you like him.

body:
How to stay in Bronze ;) LOL
(Feedback Appreciated)

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=JustTrash,realm=OCE,application-id=hIjvqaz6,discussion-id=Kc7uvWeM,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-03-26T08:40:49.080+0000)
>
> How to play Trondlemere.
> 
> 1) Press Q for instant swag points when red bar is filled
> 2) Press W to get that booty.
> 3) Press E to get Beyblade to copyright your ass.
> 4) Press R to fuck. 
> 
> Hey, you're challenger now.
> 
> {{summoner:6}} {{summoner:12}} 
> {{summoner:6}} {{summoner:14}} 
> 
> {{item:3031}} {{item:3087}} {{item:3124}} {{item:3046}} {{item:3742}} {{item:3006}}

HAHA, Probably one of the funniest comments i have ever read. thank you for that hahahaha :D
